reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, with one noting its feminine eyelet design, and appreciate its true-to-size fit and excellent quality. The fabric receives positive feedback for its wonderful eyelet material and cotton composition, while the full lining provides modest coverage. Customers find it comfortable, with one mentioning there's no itching or tugging, and appreciate its versatility for both casual and dressy occasions. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty!
items.body: Well worth the wait for this dress. Navy is a deep, true color, and the fit is flattering. The dress is lined to the top of the bottom flounce. Nicely made, comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: GranmaC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winner winner for a summer dress. Must have
items.body: Love love this summer dress. Fits so beautifully. I am 5.4” and weigh 140 lbs. it fits loose but so charming on. Love the lining and the pockets Wore it first to a Fourth of July party with red and navy jewlery and beaded shoes. I had three ladies I did not know compliment me in the dress and ask where I got it Wore it a second time at luncheon in a tea room used tourquiose jewelry this time. Had total strangers compliment me on this dress. This never happens !!!! Love the fabric weight covers the top part of the upper arms Great fabric does not wrinkle. Plus I was cool in it outside by a pool. Read more
items.author: Sherry

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just okay
items.body: This dress is very pretty—the lace eyelet detail and ruffle hem give it a nice, feminine look, and it’s comfortable to wear. The fit is flattering, but the quality doesn’t quite match the higher price tag. After the first wash, it came out completely wrinkled and very hard to smooth out, which makes it less practical for everyday wear. Overall, nice design but too expensive for what it is and disappointing in durability. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: The only way it could be any better is if the sleeves were fully lined too and if it had a round neckline with no "V" cutout. Otherwise, everything is great—quality, look, fit, feel, weight, comfort, color, and design! Love that the dress lining extends to the top of the bottom ruffle and that it has two hidden pockets! Read more
items.author: JN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Summer classic with compliments wherever I go!
items.body: What can I say about this cute dress you can put it on to go to the grocery store you can put it on to go to church. You can put it on to go visit a friend in the hospital. It is the absolutely most perfect summer dress if I wore it once I wore it 25 times this summer I washed it dried it in the dryer many times and I have to tell you it comes out looking brand new each time. Eyelet is one of those fabrics that never go out of date and always look fresh as a daisy. I love this dress and I bought it in black as well. They are my go to when I just have to pull one out quick and go where I need to go. I would give this a 20 if I could I’m 73 years old and it makes me look young, but it looks appropriate for me. I get compliments everywhere I go. I match it with gladiator sandals. I match it with cute flats. I match it with these really fun Amazon shoes that have flower pattern all over them. They come in all colors. I wear the black and I wear the white with these things sometimes I wear yellow shoes and I match it with a yellow cardigan. These dresses are amazing. Read more
items.author: Susan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: I ordered the tan dress, size M. I'm 5'2'' and 130 lbs, 34C. This dress was well made, nice cotton material, and lined. I did cut the lining off to my knees for a cooler feel. The fit is very flattering. Machine washed and let the dress hanged to dry. Read more
items.author: Lenna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So light and airy! Hides all figure flaws
items.body: I love this dress! IT's so light and airy. The underslip is perfect for full coverage except on the shoulders and upper arms. But I usually wear a full slip under it anyway. I wear it to work. The eyelet work is beautiful and it washes well...no shrinkage. which surprised me! as it's cotton. I love the drape of the fabric and the way it hides all my figure imperfections... I'm 5'7" 220 lbs and I bought an XL as the XXL was too large on top and I returned it to get the XL. My bra size is 42C. Read more
items.author: TM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have professional dress
items.body: Beautiful so comfortable true to size. The color is the same as pictured. It has a built in slip so you cannot see through it. Therefore it will be an awesome spring and fall dress. Read more
items.author: Star

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White, Blue, Apricot, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
